mapper.select: SELECT board_no, writer_id, writer_nick, hit, menu, cate, title, price, content, location, CAST(write_date AS DATE) AS write_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM liketb R WHERE R.board_no = B.board_no) AS like_cnt, (SELECT thumbnail_name FROM fileTB WHERE fileTB.board_no = B.board_no AND rownum = 1) AS thumbnail_name FROM board B
